website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech G433 is a flexible wired gaming headset that comes with a slew of accessories, though its audio performance is just average.
pros: Lots of accessories, including two sets of earpads, two audio cables, and a 7.1-channel USB sound card
cons: Can feel uncomfortable after long listening sessions

customer_reviews.title: FOR THOSE THAT HAD PROBLEM WITH HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: So basically I thought my headphones were faulty. The speaker audio was working fine, however I heard way too much static and noises, and I was thinking to myself what the problem was. I then plugged in the microphone, and when I was talking to my friends, They heard a really loud noise from my mic. I thought the headset was faulty. However, I realised that i had to flip over the cable in order for the headset to work. The headset overall was good, and the microphone is also good. Worth an upgrade compared to the G530 :).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones with an awesome audio quality and very comfortable to use even after long periods of time. The only downside is that 7.1 surround sound only works on PC ( not even Macintosh ). But for everything else is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nisabella

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sound .... in comparison
customer_reviews.text: First of all I could not make the 7.1 sound working (the ping-test worked and I could hear noises from the microphone but with sound-files no matter wich programme (Explorer, Adobe Premiere) I could hear nothing) so instead of USB I used the jack instead and that worked. But very disappointing sound. I baught this to replace a Medusa NX that broke in peaces after some years where it is fixed with a screw. But I blame it to the price-difference of 250 to (orig.) 100 BPS. The headset itself feels very cheapich compared to the Medusa. Looks like if you want full, warm sound and comfortable feeling you should not spent less than over 200,-
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Mehlis

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with MacOs for anything other than Stereo
customer_reviews.text: So as the title/headline state, these WILL NOT work with a Mac outside of Stereo mode. I have both a Windows Computer and a MacBook. Using them on Windows i can get 5.1 surround sound from Netflix (Awesome!) but when connecting the device to the Macbook, G Hub doesn't pick them up (they are actually disabled within GHubs devices.json file). For this reason i have to give these a low rating as i was hoping to use them as a daily driver throughout the working day and the evening, but appears they no longer care about the MacBook. TL;DR 7.1 surround sound possible on a Windows PC, anything with an audio jack is STEREO
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: well made and sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to ware,first time i have owned a Logitec head set,the design and construction is sturdy and lightweight So for gaming for extended time without discomfort is a big plus.The additional attachments makes the head set one of the most versatile i have used.The noise cancellation technology,is perfect for me as a gamer.The mike is a 3.5 jack and is well placed.The cables in question,one for moble's/ipads.the other for laptops/desktops, you have a usb conetion and traditional 3.5 jack.The sound quality is very nice well balanced. Does it give you Value for your bucks yes yes you could spend more for the likes of bose but for the price these will do me nicly
customer_reviews.author: mark brown

customer_reviews.title: Super microphone and good sound quality, noise cancellation could be better
customer_reviews.text: Microphone is detachable, does not detect small noise sounds such as chewing and breathing (which is really amazing for gaming) while detecting every word. The headphones have superb sound quality, with logitech software you can control the 7.1 surround, however the noise cancellation could be better because while talking you can hear your own voice quite a bit. the pads could be comfier as well (if they changed the padding to something that cancels noise better, it would fix quite few smaller issues.) Overall very good headphones for gaming, for this price, you are very unlikely to find similar quality.
customer_reviews.author: Voriukas

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset 9/10
customer_reviews.text: Best headset I have ever purchased. Great 7.1 surround, perfect for any situation. Despite being knocked down to stereo when used on a mobile device, it sounds just as good as 7.1. The headphones are easily adjusted to your personal preference via the Logitech software. Packaging is protective and a little zippy bag is included to put the headset in after use. Microphone is great and can be removed. Only con is that they aren’t good at cancelling loud background noise but still enough to most stop background noises. The sound from the headset is enough to block out most sounds. I would recommend these to anyone! I have tested the headset on Xbox, PS4, Switch and PC 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Highly temperamental mic. Lots of sounds bleed.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, but the sound bleed is insane. My partner has been sat next to me whilst WFH and could hear through her own headphones. I use it on my personal desktop, and work laptop. When on my personal desktop I have many issues around the mic. Normally, refreshing my discord tab works fine, until it decides to stop working again. The last couple of days, I have had issues despite rebooting the pc, restarting windows audio and updating drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Crackling noise 2 years in
customer_reviews.text: The headset is like the older 400 series but with a better microphone. The acoustics regardless os headset G433 G430 G432 etc are the same but the emulated 7.1 performance is the biggest difference. The microphone on G433 is superb. My only issue now is that after 2 years there's a crackling noise on the right driver. Regardless of machine I plug it into or card I use. I also tried in stereo (without the card) and it's still there. So the usual warranty=when it dies. Disappointing because my previous Logitech headphones lasted me 5 years which is why I bought Logitech instead of Razer. So yeah time to go to team green.
customer_reviews.author: Costas A.

customer_reviews.title: pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a joke. The 7.1 is tinny, echoed to hell and is so quiet. Without 7.1 there 0 bass and just dull. I just picked up a 24.99 mpow unit and it's like day an night. I will say that the design is lovely and the packaging was premium and exciting... that's about it though :(
customer_reviews.author: Mr B R Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great sounding, mic is great but unfortunately they break easily. Mine have broken just outside the warranty, cracked at the joints despite extremely careful use and lighter use than most gamers. If you are a hardcore gamer these would be broken in months. Disappointing after giving Logitech another chance following previous poor experience with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-range headset
customer_reviews.text: Material pads included in the box are worth to change straightaway as the ones that are already on are a bit rough. I like the PC cable which is flexible and covered with material. Volume regulator is about 30-40 cm from the headset along the cable. There is another cable for mobile devices but no volume reg and only one button. Headset itself used to make some pressure on my head but after a few days it's allright and feel better. For a discount I can recommend, for full price buyer got other options to consider.
customer_reviews.author: PawelN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!! Read this:
customer_reviews.text: I had it after a day which is good but considering it literally would only work in one ear is very disappointing!! For starts the detachable mic only worked on my PC after doing countless tests. Not on my PS4!! It also doesn’t sound good at all for a 7.1 surround sound headset. Don’t buy. If you want a headset similar that works flawlessly check out the Logitech G432. It’s brilliant compared to this!! Sent back after just 20 minutes of trying to get it to work!!
customer_reviews.author: Neils

customer_reviews.title: They're ok.
customer_reviews.text: These do the job but that's it. Sound is ok but lacks depth, mic works ok ish but the comfort of these is the big let down. They really clamp your head and you never forget they're there. The cloth cups that are on there as standard are awful and the velour ones make your head sweat and your ears hot.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Quite the dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: I moved over from the HyperX Cloud 2's to give the G433's a try and i've been overwhelmingly dissapointed. For a headset that is around the same price range, if not more expensive, than the Cloud 2's, the Logitech headset fails in comparison in ever possible way I can think of; comfort, sound quality, surround sound, mic quality etc. Would not recommend this product to anyone looking to purchase these for any reason in all honesty, 100% go with a HyperX headset.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Gaming Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Gaming PC and needed a decent pair or headphones and these work amazingly. the cable is long enough to plug into the back of the PC. The mic work incredibly, the noise from the background is less to none and they are great for plying FPS shooting games or any game really. I use these on a daily basis and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: James Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, uncomfortable mediocre headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Maby better products out there... cheaper and better. The microphone is rubbish/ the pads are horrendous... they start to become uncomfortable over 1-2 hours of use... the sound quality isn't half bad, but there are better from logitech themselves for a cheaper price... Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Too blue to be true!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually buy "signature series" products, but the Logitech G433 Blue were a good price so I took a punt and what a punt it was worth taking. Really happy with these, the box they came in looked pretty nice, everything laid out great, multiple cable choices accompany the set as well as a nice looking carry bag for them. Overall I am very happy with these and I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Duff

customer_reviews.title: Mic does not work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this. Thought Logitech was a good make and this wasn’t cheap. My son was very disappointed when his friends could not hear him online. Tried in both PS4 and PC and could not get any sound into the mic via usb or line in methods. Audio did work into the earpieces. Don’t bother either with the Logitech Gaming Softwre download to try and help - complete waste of time. Logitech have gone down in my estimation. Luckily returns to Amazon is straightforward. Stuff like this should just work.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: 7.1 USB and Drivers dont work with windows10
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the 7.1 feature. Dont bother! The drivers fail on windows 10 and the Logitech software also fails to access it. If you want a headset that looks nice but cant use the 7.1 features. Then get this. Otherwise go for a non Logitech device.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Smart

customer_reviews.title: not a bad headset fpr pc and ps4
customer_reviews.text: bought for the lad as he wanted a new headset for pc and ps4. have to download software to use the usb dongle on the pc to get the 7.1 surround he uses on both pc and ps4 and realy likes it, the only problem is it feels a bit tight on the head but good sound and loud
customer_reviews.author: pauldb

customer_reviews.title: Great budget headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, detachable mic and in-line mute and volume. Over ear so quite comfortable after you switch the ear pads to the alternate version that comes with it. Soundcard comes with it which does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Logitech software issue
customer_reviews.text: Initially were good but after just a couple of weeks using the headset with my Logitech mouse for gaming the Logitech software started to hang when I tried to use the bound g keys on the mouse, only occurred with the DAC so I used the jack for a couple weeks and then the headset developed a crackle when using surround sound via other software
customer_reviews.author: karl bright

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: When the 7.1 Is activted it adds a disgusting tinny filter over everything including any 3rd party Communication software making it just hardly usable. Not just that but 6 months down the line the microphone has fully stopped working rendering the headphones useless. However when they work they are of exceptional quality for the price I bought them (£40). They are listed now at 104. That is ridiculous you can get far superior headphones for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Definitely a must buy"
customer_reviews.text: I used this to play csgo ,rust ,insurgency sandstorm, escape from tarkov and so on... All sounded great in 7.1 surround... although my friends in discord change if they're surround sound or normal randomly... *can be really scary having your friend behind you suddenly* Headphones are really adjustable and provide a nice fit... *but they can be considered heavy* For the price.. these headphones go beyond what you expect... definitely a must buy..
customer_reviews.author: Josh Baker

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have plenty logitech products and find myself very disappointed with these headphones. 7.1 surround worked for about a week and now it doesn't. Won't be buying headphones from them again as customer support is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: David Little

customer_reviews.title: Pretty uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is adequate, sound quality is adequate (but not amazing), and the headphones are quite uncomfortable. Too much pressure on the headband.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Good when they actually work
customer_reviews.text: Quality of sound is great, colour is lush Not terribly easy to use, a bit temperamental when it comes to actually working on my computer which is annoying. Like I wouldn’t view them as very reliable. But when they work, they work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones because they look so “natural” you can wear them in public listening to music without looking like a gamer with a microphone sticking out of it. The meshed ear cups makes a scratchy sound on your face (expecially if you have facial hair) but just a minor detail. Resolved if you use the standard material Logitech also provide in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good but Ghub is trash
customer_reviews.text: Good and comfortable headset, microphone is pretty good. The G-Hub software is awful though, it makes the audio output much lower than it is without the software. If you're using the mic, it will play back what you say into the speakers, which is stupid. Change the sidetone slider to 0 in G-hub if that's the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Initial review: Astonishing
customer_reviews.text: From a G633 to G433, it was a surprising upgrade simply because I didn't think it would be. The audio and microphone quality is amazing as well as the overall feel and weight (may change due to preference). But it is a great product. The only downfall, which many have stated already, is the lack of noise cancellation but in my own circumstances, it has not been a problem at all. One last thing to comment is of the longevity as this is only an initial review of the first-day appreciation of the product so I cannot comment on the endurance that this headset shall provide.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this headset for a few months and it is the best I have had for the price. From my friends words the mic is very clear. A down side to this headset is that the ear cups are disgusting to feel and are not very sound cancelling so I switched the ear cups with some of the one from of my old headsets which 1.made it a lot more comfortable 2.way more noise cancelling Overall a very good headset!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: -4 Stars only due to the poor quality adaptor it was sent with. -Great comfort, with exchangeable ear cups to a suede-esque feel to them. -Excellent build quality, something I've had troubles with some Logitech items in the past. -Sound quality with the shipped adaptor wasn't brilliant so I had to switch it out to one I received with a previous Logitech headset, but once switched the sound quality is brilliant. -With the Logitech "G-Hub" application you can change the levels of frequencies for fine tuning your sound, with the ability to save your set ups too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Poulding

customer_reviews.title: They're.. ok
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have surround on they sound really good! with surround though they sound tinny and washed out. The sound also lags pretty bad while playing resource heavy games and they only way to fix it is to unplug the wire from the adapter and plug in directly to the pc.
customer_reviews.author: The Flibble!

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, quality of the microphone is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to wait a month so i could get to grips with the headset and i can say that although it sounds great and functions really well for me, the full retail price would not be enough for me to buy hence why i purchased it at a lower price. With that said i am not going to deny that it is a good headset and it came with all the wires intact.
customer_reviews.author: Mansur Khaleque

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the better headsets I've had. Great sound quality but a little bulky. Mic quality is fine, bonus is it's detachable so if you're not using it it's not in your way. Righthand joint broke after ~20 months of heavy daily use for gaming and music production. Would purchase again but have an alternative now
customer_reviews.author: David Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good set but could do with more bass
customer_reviews.text: Could have more bass but for gaming they are good. Some initial reports of the mic picking up background noise. Generally comfy but fairly tight fitting. Have had to return 2 other headsets due to faults out the box, so to have these working all fine is great
customer_reviews.author: craigo

customer_reviews.title: Would have expected better from Logitech
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality item, the microphone didn’t work, and the usb sac adaptor wouldn’t be picked up by the new logo tech driver suite. Sent for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Logitech products are normally good but this one is not one of them. bought it for my xbox. the box and the wrapping were good but the product performance was poor. not good for party chat.
customer_reviews.author: Milinda Abesyinghe

customer_reviews.title: Bought as used.  Seem Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Son says great all round but becomes uncomfortable after a while. Bought as used good. Ear pads were quite sweaty smelling but cleaned. Seem ok.
customer_reviews.author: D Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I can wear these for hours and I don't feel any discomfort. I use them with my Xbox One S so I haven't been able to take advantage of the 7.1 surround sound. However, if you have a PC then I'm sure they will sound even better. Sound quality is excellent and the mesh design means my ears don't get too warm over extended periods of use. The colours are really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on something better
customer_reviews.text: This headset is pretty wank for the price. A dodgy converter to mic/line out that crackles when you move it new out the box? Plus unless I’ve got some bonkers setting enabled that my google searching hasn’t unearthed, it plays my line out through my mic to people on discord so they have to listen to whatever I’m playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hiscock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Found whilst was on sale to replace a cheap headset and the difference is unreal! Works well in both my PC and Xbox, the clarity of the microphone was quickly noticed by my friends and the surround sound from movies on the PC is amazing. The setup took seconds as I already had Logitech G Hub on my PC but downloading and setting up G Hub is really easy too. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: tqsean

customer_reviews.title: Surround sound is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great and the 7.1 is a fantastic audio experience, mic isn’t too bad either but I don’t use it because I have a stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: Martin wasabi

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and using the usb 7.1 adapter you can hear your own voice so you can tell if your breathing heavy into the mic. Love it
customer_reviews.author: dss199

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my son as his other headphones were only £15 and an off brand of some type. The headphones are amazing. I would definitely buy these as they are not too expensive and not too cheap. The 7.1 surround sound works perfectly and offers the user an excellent experience!
customer_reviews.author: D. Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset.
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset for the price, a little un comfy but you get used to it after a while and they break in. A warning is the surround sound does not work on mac, they do state this but not very clearly, however, I'm still pleased with the product and the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Eke

customer_reviews.title: logitech G433 Not very good !!
customer_reviews.text: Not very good !! bad noise isolation and there is an echo like hearing them through PVC pipe that will not go away
customer_reviews.author: damien w

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant set of headphones Used for gaming and sound quality is brilliant Great to have a detachable cable makes getting up quickly between games better Quality of headset is great built brilliantly and very comfortable with the ability to take pads off for cleaning Logitech always a great choice for quality in build and performance
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable after prolonged use, long sessions not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, but the mic is atrocious... Its so quiet and muffles everything when plugged in using the USB dongle. If you want to use the built in mic, don't use the dongle. Your friends won't be able to hear you properly. Build quality is great but it's just not very comfortable after prolonged use,so not ideal for long gaming sessions. I've had to return it because of this. It's tight around the head and the fabric rubs on your skin a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: Romiell

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: Needed replacement for broken ones. With the offer they are a very good deal. Sound quality better than my old and more expensive pair
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality with these headphone was just appalling it sounded like you bought those cheap £1 ear phones from a store, this headphones had no bass at all it was all crap the worst head phones i have ever set my hands on, yet alone it was so distorted even at low it was awful, i couldn't adjust the equaliser without it sounding bad, a pair of cheap headphones sounds better than these i wouldn't recommend getting these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Juvan

customer_reviews.title: Simple but fun and easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Very much recommended, and is in such demand someone broke into my car to steal it from my backseat... I hope the thieves are colourblind so can't play it... still I brought another one as it is so good. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon White

customer_reviews.title: Peak Logitech performance!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best headsets I’ve had in a while the surroundsound technology is mind blowing whether you’re gaming or watching a movie the quality is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Alexa

customer_reviews.title: amazing value for money.
customer_reviews.text: the headphones are so simple to use. i have used the USB connector and Dolby 7.1 sounds amazing! the mic quality is OK, maybe could do with some foam covering the tip of the mic, as it does pick up breathing and breeze quite easily. but for the price these headphones get 5* all day long
customer_reviews.author: Imthetomguy123

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G433 wired Headphobes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for gaming pc ps4 phone. Fantastic sound. Good build quality. This speaks for it self.
customer_reviews.author: Jaffary

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Nice feeling headset, but didn't work, mic wasn't working and some of the supposed audio channels made no sound. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these for PC gaming and find the sound quality great. Mic is great for chat, although I had to boost the volume on my pc as it is very quiet, which is why i have only given 4 stars for gaming. Very comfortable for prolonged use and comes with 2 sets of ear surrounds made from different materials. Loads of cables for different uses are included, as well as a case. A bargain for the around £40 I paid for them
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: No packaging whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. Arrived without any packing at all. The address label had been stuck directly on the headset box. Surely it was not rocket science to realise this was likely to be a present, arriving on 23rd December. That ruined any element of surprise, as the intended recipient lives in the same household, and made the box look shopsoiled, rather than brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Szemeti

customer_reviews.title: Ok headset. Can't wear for long
customer_reviews.text: Ok headset, they can but quite itchy and irritating if worn for a long time. Sound quality is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: These just stopped working and he had them for Xmas 2019.We have tried all ways to get support with the information received with the headset it’s like hitting a brick wall.
customer_reviews.author: LindaLockwood

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product for my gaming needs and it did not disappoint, good microphone for talking to friends and also good sound quality although it was quite heavy on your head compared to most headsets had no problems i wouldn't recommend using the 7.1 surround sound because it makes it feel like a sort of echo noise when speaking to friends but overall a good product and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't get fooled by Design Awards 2018
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile and Ilike the use of a DAC that come with the headphones however, they are very unconfortable. They also don't block out sound due to the odd choice of materials. Sound quality feels empty even with the DAC. Btter options out there.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset
customer_reviews.text: Very well built headset, great sound and very comfortable. The detachable mic is very useful. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as a gift for my nephew, who loves them! Product as described and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Best headsets
customer_reviews.text: Best headsets I’ve ever used, comes with a bunch of aux cables and one from aux to usb to utilize the surround sound and god almighty this is a must. Haven’t tested the mic but the feel the design and everything else is perfect. The cables are breaded so are more durable
customer_reviews.author: Proto

customer_reviews.title: Headset is good but microphone is bad.
customer_reviews.text: Actual headset is really good its lightweight and comfortable. Sound quality is good. Microphone stopped working after a month meaning I'm going to have to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Marrs

customer_reviews.title: Quality headset
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is quality for money great padding around the ears amust for any gamer great sound and mic highly reccomend these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly let down by software
customer_reviews.text: I have had constant issues with the Logitech Software which has led to certain channels not working in the surround sound, breaking in the middle of a game meaning I need to restart and drivers constantly crashing. Its such a shame because when working, the sound is nice and the headset of nice build. I have brought from Logitech a lot however I don't believe for headsets in the future I will be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: The sound was just really low with everything turned up, I could not hear the 7.1 system working and was playing a game that would have been easy to hear it. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Neil B

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the comfort, could wear for hours. Sound quality is great, but could do with an independent adjustment for both game volume and chat volume for gaming. Sound quality from the microphone isn’t as good as previous turtle beaches, but it’s still good.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, but Surround Sound not recommended, but would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Surround Sound great for movies but wouldn't recommend it for gaming and Mic can be in an annoying place but can be removed when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Flexable
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very versatile and comfortable. Especially for longer gaming sessions. Mic is decent for game chat or a skype/discord call but don't expect it to pull off great sound quality for YT videos.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: G433 review
customer_reviews.text: I really would recommend these headphones especially for the price they are amazing value I would recommend switching the earcups with the ones included in the packaging the sound quality is really good with booming bass, vibrant mids and amazing treble. They don't have the best noise isolation but I wouldn't expect that for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, should be priced lower
customer_reviews.text: These are definetly above average, but the mic has no wind filter so lots of breathing noises. Also the earcup material is like sandpaper around me ears. Returned mine for the Logitech Pro X
customer_reviews.author: Charles Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: After a coupe of months of usage
customer_reviews.text: Sound is solid 7-8 / 10, but sadly bass is not as strong as I would have liked (5 - 6 / 10). However, for gaming the sound is great 9/10. Fits well to the head and, although first impression was that they are too hard, my head is not hurting after using them for 8-10 hours at a time so it's all good. Plus the cable is long, which was important for me. Overall solid 8/10 for everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: Casual user

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 12 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought last August to replace a HyperX headset. Worked adequately but for the last few weeks, have been experiencing speakers dying intermittently in each ear, which is very frustrating. Problem could be the speakers or the cable. Either way, I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but good?
customer_reviews.text: Tight? Rock solid ear cups? Hard to change between? Not clear as to how to setup without manual? Not that decent mic quality? Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: ctahmid

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son, he loves them! My only gripe was that they were delivered with no packaging round the box, luckily my husband intercepted the parcel before my son could see them.
customer_reviews.author: madmumoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing headphone
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I don’t really know what to say, it is a amazing piece of equipment. Excellent sound quality and extremely comfortable. I recommend it over any headphone
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Iv had to give this three stars because it's rather uncomfortable, I have a large head but wasn't expecting problems this bad and the mic quality was according to people I play with, worse then the £20 headset I usually use.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Priest

customer_reviews.title: I can hear myself talking
customer_reviews.text: It has never worked properly it seems well built and isn’t too uncomfortable but it annoys me that when I’m talking to people whether it’s on the PlayStation or on the computer I can hear myself slightly and it’s enough to make the experience a poor one I don’t know if this is a one off but I left it for over a year because I couldn’t be bothered with the hassle of sorting out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: nancy, Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: AVOID IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Open-designed and super bad build quality. I can't hear precisely in CSGO either. It sells less than half in other markets so buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bingzheng

customer_reviews.title: The cable broke and now my son is not able to use it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my son and he was not satisfied due to the week wiring and it broke when he plugged it out his controller
customer_reviews.author: Eibhlis

customer_reviews.title: Decent for music
customer_reviews.text: Sound will have to get used to, not bad just different. The surround sound isn't very good though, makes every sound canny. Stereo is good enough for music/gaming so still a high rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I use the for gaming to play call of duty mainly and it's better than the £120 Steelseries x5 I had before I can hear the footsteps better on this than them well worth it just show not always the more Expensive ones are better
customer_reviews.author: louise jones

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there were any fault on it or not but... My impression is not the best for the price... I think the sound is not laudly enough. Quality of sound is good... I'm playing CS and overall is good but now for the original price....
customer_reviews.author: igor

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G433
customer_reviews.text: The Mic on this product is extremely poor as it can be removed etc, however the jack point is poor & it really is the worst product I have ever had from Logitec. dont waste your money on this particular set go for the Logitec G430 headset by far a miles better product & works superbly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominus-Virus

customer_reviews.text: Unreal sounding headphones i got my for 70 or 80 pound so bargain too
customer_reviews.author: Autoflower 420

customer_reviews.title: Really good at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones they’re so nice, comfortable and have really good noise cancellation. They make me feel immersed and makes me focus on the game. Love them👌
customer_reviews.author: Zakary Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good budget headset
customer_reviews.text: Good headset for the price, comes with 2 sets of earpads. Overall has good audio and a good build, would recommend this as a budget option.
customer_reviews.author: PalmTree

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: As normal for Logitech it's as good as it gets for a reasonable price Audio is great haven't used the microphone but YouTube reviews show it off
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality... sound great
customer_reviews.text: All good... not fell to pieces like more expensive headphones.. so happy..!! Audio quality must be ok, as my son hasn’t moaned.. !!
customer_reviews.author: alan kelly

customer_reviews.title: Logiwack
customer_reviews.text: Can’t recommend this headset as there was sound leaking and echoing on console. Not very comfortable for me and feels cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: StarLordLoki

customer_reviews.title: good sound great mic but one problem.
customer_reviews.text: good headset, great audio, good mic but only 4 stars because I noticed only one day after buying that there is some sort of broken peice inside of the right ear cup and everytime I move my head while playing I can near it rattling about but overall agreat hedset for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan MacDuff

customer_reviews.title: Have to use just one ear.
customer_reviews.text: Very hot ears. Also when used as a mic, the noise cancelling makes speaking difficult, there needs to be instant voice feedback to hear yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Whereas I did give 5 stars on all criteria, the build itself was a bit poor. The wire, being fibre would knot and wrap up, this led to the fibre ripping, exposing the rubber. Other than my one complaint, it's a great headset and would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Bad audio for pc
customer_reviews.text: The audio on this headset is terrible, if you have ever had a headset that's even slightly decent this will seem like the devil of headsets, the detachable mic and easy compatibility with consoles is rather useful though. Although this headset says it works on pc, i'd suggest you only buy it if you're going to use it on console.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Bloody good headset I got this on a deal which was a steal I might add very well made and durable plus comfortable to use for those long gaming sessions
customer_reviews.author: Jay_LVC Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connections
customer_reviews.text: I very much regret buying this headset. The jack connections are terrible, I've spent more time with the headset in my hands having to adjust the jack than I have with it on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Manco

product_meta.title: Logitech G433 Wired Gaming Headset, 7.1 Surround Sound for PC, Xbox One, PS4, Switch, Mobile - Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlueThe Logitech G433 7.1 Gaming Headset features advanced audio technologies such as Pro-G drivers and DTS Headphone:X, in a comfortable, lightweight and stylish design. Pro-G drivers are optimised for both analogue and digital sound reproduction regardless of the source. With the included USB sound card and DTS Headphone:X, G433 accurately replicates 7.1 speaker placement and audio positioning. The headset includes a removable, high-quality boom microphone with a micro pop filter for high-quality voice chat. G433 is Discord certified to guarantee crystal-clear communication and audio performance. It comes in four custom colours: Royal Blue, Fire Red and Triple Black.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Wired gaming headset
USB DAC with 3.5 mm, 4-pole output
Detachable microphone boom with micro pop filter
Mobile cable with inline controls and mic
Console/PC cable with inline controls
PC splitter for separate mic and headphone jacks
Additional microfiber ear pads
Headset carrying bag
User documentation 2-year manufacturer’s guarantee and full product support
feature_bullets: DTS 7.1 + Pro-G - 7.1 positional audio: Immersion in game via 360 degree audio environment; Pro-G: Hybrid-mesh drivers deliver precise and clear audio the way it was intended.Sensitivity: 107dB@1KHz SPL 30mW/1cm
Lightweight fabric shell - whether in the game or out in the world, the hydrophobic, stain-resistant fabric keeps G433 gaming headset looking as amazing as it sounds
Sports-mesh ear pads - keep cool and comfortable over long gaming sessions with breathable, washable sports-mesh ear pads; extra-soft micro fiber ear pads also included with the gaming headset
Detachable, transformable - don't just hear, be heard; boom mic delivers enhanced voice quality for PC or console game chat with noise-reducing, G433 is a fully-equipped gaming headset
Console compatible - nintendo switch, PS4 and Xbox One get an upgrade with G433 advanced audio and noise-canceling boom mic; the standard audio cables plug straight into most console controllers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,652 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
